marketing information: The AIS 18.5" PCT multi-touch widescreen monitor is a fully-integrated, off-the-shelf unit (COTS) that combines high-performance Projected Capacitive Touch Technology (PCT or PCAP), in an industrial-grade LCD flat panel, with a sleek and flat front surface industrial design. This PCAP technology is a capacitance system that delivers sensitive and accurate two-touch interactive experience. AIS industrial widescreen multi-touch flat panel displays are specifically suited for use in information kiosks, self-service kiosk systems, medical healthcare, as well as interactive digital signage applications.
